channel.title: MaxHit Help

item.title: MaxHit Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Ok I am trying to make the rapier (not chaotic) be good against bosses in the calculatemeleemaxhit
So basically, here is my code, and Im getting the "cannot find symbol error when i compile. What I dont get is why its doing that, I see it being used in another part of the class file. Also, I plan on adding 6 more npcs to this if that matters or not. Thanks in advance.

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 7142 && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 8596) { maxHit *= 1.18; }

Read full topic
